question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the roof of a very short building with a yellow exterior wall. Is the destination within sight at the current location? If yes, where is the destination in the view?  
choose:  
A. I see the roof of a very short building with a yellow exterior wall in the upper left corner of my field of view.  
B. The roof of a very short building with yellow exterior walls is not within my field of view.  
C. I see the roof of a very short building with yellow exterior walls in the center of my field of view.  
D. I see the roof of a very short building with yellow exterior walls on the right side of my field of view.  
E. I see the roof of a very short building with yellow exterior walls in the lower left corner of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The initial frames show a view of tall buildings, but there is no visible roof of a very short building with a yellow exterior wall within the field of view. The buildings in sight are all high-rise structures.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 20)]
Option: [B]
Reason: The video shows a view of tall buildings. There is no visible roof of a very short building with a yellow exterior wall within the field of view. The buildings in sight are all high-rise structures.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The initial frames show a view of tall buildings, but there is no visible roof of a very short building with a yellow exterior wall within the field of view. The buildings in sight are all high-rise structures.
